trans-unit.source: Terminates the running workflow instance, raises the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*> event in the host, and reports error information.
trans-unit.target: Avslutar körs arbetsflödesinstansen, genererar den <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*>händelse i värd och rapporter felinformation.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed*>

trans-unit.source: Once the workflow is terminated, it cannot be resumed.
trans-unit.target: När arbetsflödet avbryts, kan inte fortsätta.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exception that provoked the instance termination.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger det undantag som provoked instans-avslutning.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> is set.
trans-unit.target: Undantag som skickas till <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>är en <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>om endast <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>har angetts.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If only Exception is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om endast undantag anges har att undantag överförts till <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> and Exception are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, and Exception is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Om båda <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>och undantag anges en <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>skickas med det angivna <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>, och undantag som har angetts som undantaget <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Reason%2A>

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
A string input argument with the reason for the workflow instance termination.
trans-unit.target: En sträng indataargument med orsaken till att arbetsflödet instans.

trans-unit.source: The exception that is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> is a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> if only Reason is set.
trans-unit.target: Undantag som skickas till <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>är en <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>om endast orsak.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If only <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set, that exception is passed to <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Om det bara <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>är inställd att undantag har överförts till <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A>.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Terminate%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both Reason and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> are set, a <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is passed with the specified Reason, and <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> is set as the exception’s <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Om båda skäl och <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>ställs in, en <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException>skickas med den angivna orsaken och <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>har angetts som undantaget <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>egenskap.</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TerminateWorkflow.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: If neither is set, a default <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationTerminatedException> is created.
